```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

This document reflects the content of KEGG database:

+ **Drugs** -> 5411
+ **DDIs** -> 685565
+ **Targets** where DDIs are involved in.
+ **List of diseases** single drugs are involved in.
+ **List of pathways** single drugs are involved in.
+ **List of chemical group** each drug belongs to.
+ **KEGG_NO_DDI** list of interactions involving drugs and other components.
